snippet: The Conference Board said Friday that its index of leading indicators rose 0.1 percent last month after no change in July and a 0.6 percent jump in June.
abstract: Conference Board says its index of leading indicators climbed 0.1 percent in August after staying flat in July.
lead_paragraph: The Conference Board said Friday that its index of leading indicators rose 0.1 percent last month after no change in July and a 0.6 percent jump in June.

headline.main: Leading Economic Index Rose Slightly in August
